moves.title: Other
changes: Will now regain up special after doing a walljump tech if up special was already used

moves.title: Side Special (PK Freeze)
changes: PK Freeze is no longer hittable after it hits an object or opponent

moves.title: Up Smash
changes: Up smash’s center hitboxes in the second and third hits can now hit aerial opponents

moves.title: Other
changes: Grabbing Meta Knight out of glide will no longer prevent him from using special moves

moves.title: Other
changes: Will now regain up special after doing a walljump tech if up special was already used

moves.title: Other
changes: Will now regain up special after doing a walljump tech if up special was already used

moves.title: Other
changes: Shield dropping should now match other characters 1:1, after missing a couple angles previously

changes.title: Default
changes: Remade completely; now more closely matches the design of other HD 64 stages

changes.title: Default
changes: A re-imagining of the classic Smash 64 stage. Replaces Brinstar, which can now be found on the Y alt of this stage

moves.title: Characters and Gameplay
changes: Frame advance in replays should no longer desync them
Various characters (Giga Bowser, Ike, MK, Samus, and Toon Link) now have properly coded checks for some GFX
Grabbing ledge out of Diddy Kong’s Up Special no longer causes his model to rotate oddly
Restored Pit’s shield model during Up Special

moves.title: Stages
changes: Parts of grass on Golden Temple now render properly
Green Hill Zone’s texture mapping now properly displays the tile texture

moves.title: Costumes
changes: Dr. Mario costumes polished and optimized
Builder Mario completely redone, with a revamped blue recolor
Mr. L costumes polished and optimized, with new recolors
Casino Luigi costumes polished and optimized
Fighter Kirby redone to take advantage of new hat model code, along with new recolors
Pajama Ness received small touchups on its seams
All Samus suits (except for Fusion and Retro) optimized and polished
Helmet on Light Suit and PED Samus alts adjusted
Shadow and Tails semi-alts for Sonic redone and optimized
Jet Set Sonic redone, with new recolors and an added purple recolor
Espio and Vector semi-alts for Knuckles redone and optimized
Materials on Charmy semi-alt fixed
Jet Set Knuckles redone with new recolors

moves.title: Features
changes: Kirby hats can now be set to disappear when a copy ability is dawned (used for revamped Fighter Kirby alts)

moves.title: Other
changes: Added “Green Brinstar” remix for Planet Zebes
“Misty Time” cut from Smashville
Strap and Results screens updated for version 2.29
